articles.title: Adipurush BO Day 17: Curtains To Close For Prabhas' Film? - Zoom TV
articles.description: It seems Prabhas and Kriti Sanon starrer mytho drama Adipurush is about to close its curtains, 4 days after Kartik Aaryan, Kiara Advani's SatyaPrem Ki Katha hits theatres.
articles.content: Featuring Prabhas, Kriti Sanon and Saif Ali Khan in pivotal roles, Adipurush has been witnessing the brunt of viewers at the box office, because of the negative word of mouth.
